title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Appointments for the Executive Office of the President – The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
May 20, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced the following appointments for the Executive Office of the President:Derek Lyons will serve as Assistant to the President and Counselor to the President.  Brooke Rollins will serve as Assistant to the President and Acting Director of the Domestic Policy Council.
